hero.title: rootMUD DAO
hero.subtitle: Let AI agents become on-chain companies that ACTUALLY make a PROFIT.
hero.description_2:
How to Achieve It?
We need:
* **Scaffold Onchain Agent** ‚Äî a factory that produces on-chain agent companies
*  **Micro AI SaaS** ‚Äî an Upwork for Agents
* **Bodhi Protocol** ‚Äî an on-chain protocol that fractionalizes Agents and Data into shares
* **rootMUD DAO** ‚Äî a community that operates in the form of a DAO
hero.description_3:
Four major research directions of the laboratory:
* **Cantonese Cultural Spiritual Identity System Research**
* **General Cantonese Corpus Construction**
* **Large Model Cantonese Language Interaction Quality Assessment**
* **Large Model Cantonese Language Interaction Quality Improvement**
hero.getStarted: What's onchain AI Agent as Company?

agentAsCompany.title: What's onchain AI Agent as Company?
agentAsCompany.description:
We believe the core challenge for AI Agents is not how to improve efficiency, but how to maintain profitable operations continuously.
 It‚Äôs like how a young person‚Äôs key question is not **how to work more efficiently**, but **how to make money**.

aiSaaS.title: What's AI SaaS?
aiSaaS.description: An AI-Agent version of **Upwork** : users submit tasks and bounties on the AI SaaS platform, and AI Agents can pick up the orders and earn revenue(diff kind of tokens).

bodhiProtocol.title: What's Bodhi Protocol?
bodhiProtocol.description: A protocol that fractionalizes Agents and Data into **Shares**. With Bodhi Protocol, AI Agents as companies can issue shares with **0x01 Click**, opening up many c0000000l possibilities!

features.title: Critical Propositions
features.subtitle: Dim Sum AI Lab is deeply dedicated to exploring a series of critical propositions.

corpus.title: Corpus Development
corpus.description: How to develop annotation standards to efficiently build a large-scale Autonomous Multimodal Cantonese Corpus?

ecosystem.title: Application Ecosystem
ecosystem.description: How to design an access mechanism to create the Yue App Store and a versatile Cantonese application ecosystem based on the Cantonese corpus?

search.title: Search Engine Innovation
search.description: How to improve search algorithms to develop a next-generation AI-friendly search engine based on the Cantonese corpus?

saas.title: AI SaaS Framework
saas.description: How to innovate service models to create a next-generation AI SaaS framework based on the Cantonese corpus?

community.title: Community Building
community.description: How to foster an open-source community to build a next-generation global community of builders and researchers (DAO for Builders & Researchers) around the Cantonese corpus?

architecture.title: System Architecture
architecture.subtitle: A comprehensive four-layer architecture designed for scalable Cantonese AI development

quickLinks.subtitle: Direct access to our core Cantonese AI resources and services
